data.title: Elevator World Inc. on LinkedIn: Hyperion Solutions Announces Acquisition of Titan Machine Corp.
data.meta_description: Hyperion Solutions, a premier integrated provider of systems and components, digital solutions and technical services for the vertical transportation industry,…
data.text:
APEX Elevator Inspection & Testing, LLC, headquartered in Collegeville, Pennsylvania, and mainly serving Pennsylvania and Delaware, has joined VDA, Inc., Hanover, New Jersey-based VDA announced https://lnkd.in/ekiQ9sbC

Montanari Group, the Italy-based manufacturer of elevator traction machines, has partnered with Triumph Electrical Supply, with headquarters in Mineola, NY, for Triumph to stock and supply Montanari machines across North America. https://lnkd.in/egK8HuQ4

Otis Brazil’s factory in São Bernardo do Campo recently received ISO 45001 certification, an international standard that specifies the requirements and good practices for effective occupational health and safety management systems. https://lnkd.in/ed2YgUdf

NAESA International has announced that the Elevator Inspector Trainee Program is now open for registration. https://lnkd.in/ecHpfsZy

Elevator parts supplier SEES, Inc., headquartered in Pompano Beach, Florida, has announced a strategic partnership with VT industry veteran Sterrett Lloyd as its national business advisor. https://lnkd.in/eh9YaKbU

Ziehl-Abegg, a leader in drive and control technology, held two seminars in June on elevator technology in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, in collaboration with Doza Technology

NAESA International has announced it has received approval to teach New York Mechanics training classes. https://lnkd.in/ecJKMP2D

Stephen Jacob Smith, founder and executive director of the Center for Building in North America, used the elevator to explain why housing costs have skyrocketed, among other woes, in a guest essay for The New York Times https://lnkd.in/eXVw38N6

TK Elevator (TKE) announced on July 16 it has been selected to modernize all 22 escalators that provide access to the iconic Montjuïc area in Barcelona, Spain. https://lnkd.in/eu9U9Aqf

Otis Worldwide Corp. has been recognized for its commitment to disability inclusion by the Disability Equality Index® by being named a Best Place to Work for Disability Inclusion for 2024 in five countries.
